name: HEOSHomeEntertainment
0:
”Alexa, play The Beatles on Kitchen”
”Alexa, pause on Bedroom”
”Alexa, volume up on Family Room”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get great sound quality hands-free from all Denon, Marantz and HEOS-branded products that can be controlled by the HEOS app.
 
Use voice commands to search for songs, albums, and artists as well as podcasts and internet stations, etc. Control streaming music on your HEOS compatible devices with your voice. This release gives Alexa control of HEOS - even in multiple rooms (*See below for compatible devices & supported music services).
 
Alexa, play The Beatles on Dining Room
Alexa, play the latest episode of This American Life on Living Room
Alexa, play WNYC from TuneIn on Kitchen
Alexa, play the album Nevermind by Nirvana on Bedroom
Alexa, turn down the volume on Dining Room
Alexa, resume on Bedroom
Alexa, next on Bedroom
Alexa, previous on Bedroom
Alexa, start over on Bedroom
Alexa, pause on Bedroom
Alexa, stop on Bedroom
Alexa, mute on Kitchen
Alexa, unmute on Kitchen
 
 
 
GETTING STARTED
Step 1: In the HEOS app
Go to Settings-->My Devices. Choose an easy-to-say name like Living Room or Kitchen for each HEOS device. Tap the checkmark when you’re done to save the new name. If you already have another Alexa smart home device using the same name, you’ll need to create a distinct name for your HEOS device or vice versa.
 
Step 2: If you already have the Alexa app, click the skills section in the Alexa App menu, search for the HEOS skill, enable the HEOS skill, and link your HEOS Account to your Alexa Account. Once you have successfully linked accounts, say, "Alexa, discover my devices".
 
NOTE: Whenever you change the name of one of your HEOS devices, you’ll need to ask Alexa to rediscover your devices so she can find the new name.
 
FAQ: Check here for some helpful troubleshooting tips and suggestions
http://denon.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/5919
 
SUPPORTED DEVICES
Works with all Denon, Marantz and HEOS-branded products that can be controlled by the HEOS app, that is:
- All Denon products with HEOS Built-in
- All Marantz products with HEOS Built-in
- All HEOS-branded products
 
SUPPORTED MUSIC SERVICES IN USA
* Pandora
* Amazon Music
* TuneIn
* iHeart Radio
* more coming soon
